section.name: Result Var
section.p:
added an attributed 'result-var' to the <step>
element - when set, it names a scripting variable in which to store a map of the results of the cea call. so now possible to set up workflow variables, manipulate via script elements, pass in as parameter to cea calls, define new variables from results of cea calls.

section.name: System Objects
section.p:
a binding to an instance of the Astrogrid class into the JEScript environment. This means that methods on the Astrogrid scripting object can be called from <script>
steps in workflows.

Whats the point? Now its possible to write workflow documents that contain script steps that do useful things like
copy / move / delete files in vospace.
read contents of a vospace file into a workflow scripting variable
write contents of a vospace file
query registry
and mindboggling / daft things like
create and submit child-workflow documents
cancel or delete their own workflow.
